settings.title: FAQs
settings.subtitle: Quickly find out if we've already addressed your query.

settings.accordion_content: Yes, all lenses for 8ight Stella or Solar Cover Sunglasses are all polarized to protect your eyes from the Sun’s rays.

settings.accordion_title: 2. Do your lenses offer UV Protection?
settings.accordion_content: Yes, we take eye health and protection very seriously, that is why 8ight Stella or Solar Cover Sunglasses lenses are POLARIZED UV400, that can block 100% of UVA and UVB rays.

settings.accordion_title: 3. Do you accept an exchange or request for replacement?
settings.accordion_content: Unfortunately, No. That is why we highly encourage you to double check your order to ensure that you are ordering the correct product/s.

settings.accordion_title: 4. How long is the delivery process?
settings.accordion_content: For orders within Metro Manila, please expect delivery within 3-5 days. For provincial areas, delivery may vary depending on the courier’s schedule but estimated shipping duration is 7-12 days.

settings.accordion_title: 5. Can I change the lenses to prescription ones based on my eye grade?
settings.accordion_content: Yes, you can, though we highly advice that you talk with your licensed Optometrist first if they can assist you with the switching and refitting of prescription lenses using your 8ight Stella or Solar Cover Sunglasses.
Yes, we offer a 7-day warranty from the date of confirmed delivery. Our warranty only covers factory defect detected or noticed upon receive of the item.

settings.accordion_title: 7. Are 8ight Stella or Solar Cover Sunglasses heavy?
settings.accordion_content: Not at all! Weighing less than 20 grams, about the weight of a AA battery, you don’t have to worry about uncomfortable and unsightly nose indentations.

settings.accordion_title: 8. How do I determine which design will fit my face?
settings.accordion_content: 8ight Stella or Solar Cover Sunglasses comes with their dimensions indicated, which you can use as reference when determining the design that will perfectly fit you. We also provided a recommendation chart for each models, which shows the face shapes that will go well with each design.

settings.accordion_title: 9. Why should I buy 8ight Stella or Solar Cover Sunglasses?
settings.accordion_content:
If you are someone who is always on the go, yet want to stay fashionable while protected under the glaring sun, 8ight Stella or Solar Cover Sunglasses are perfect for you. Why? Because you can practically carry them wherever you go, without all the bulky, extra space that a typical sunglass usually occupies in your purse. 8ight Stella is so thin that it will fit easily in the breast pocket of your coat or the side pockets of your jeans.
If you are already wearing prescription eyeglasses and still wants to wear sunglasses to avoid the sun’s glare, Solar Cover clip on sunglasses are perfect for you! All you need to do is clip your Solar Cover Sunglasses on top of your eyeglasses, and you’re ready to walk under the sunshine!

settings.accordion_title: 10. I would like to take a look at the actual sunglasses and fit it in person. Do you have any physical stores or boutiques that I could visit?
settings.accordion_content: Yes, we have partner optical clinics that also sell 8ight Stella or Solar Cover Sunglasses. Please refer below for their location.

settings.title: Visit Our Store
settings.subtitle: We offer the latest, most unique sunglasses that will make our patrons look fashionable, anytime, anywhere.
